EmailTemplate.description: communicate need to follow-up for effectiveness check
EmailTemplate.name: Case: Effectiveness FollowUp
EmailTemplate.subject: DPT Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Requires an Effectiveness Check.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: It's time to followup on Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} for the Effectiveness Check. Please click on the following link for more complete Case Information: {!Case.Id}
